document_title: What is cystic acne? Identification characteristics of common types today
subsection_content:
Clean your face and body every day with gentle shower gel and shampoo products. For facial skin, gently wash with warm water and gentle cleanser twice a day to remove excess oil. You should wash with clean hands or a clean, soft wet towel, do not use a dry towel to avoid friction that can cause further irritation to the skin.
Avoid using products that can irritate the skin such as cosmetics or sunscreen. In particular, do not touch your face, do not squeeze acne... to avoid worsening acne, leading to infection or scarring.
